title: Running vmlinux ELF under QEMU
content:
I have a vmlinux ELF file to run under QEMU. My arguments to 
qemu-system-arm.exe
are: The correct 
-cpu
argument. The versatilepb 
-machine
which I'm not sure if it's the right choose, but can't see the other options with 
-cpu help
. The 
-kernel
flag to pass the 
vmlinux
file. The 
-serial stdio -nographic
flags with 
"console=ttyAMA0 console=tty1 console=ttyS0"
kernel arguments. Why I don't see any output? I also tried the 
-D
flag to get a log file.
